title: Statue (Darkmeyer)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Statue is an altar located in the upper tier of Darkmeyer in a building just south of the bank. When prayed at, this altar will restore all Prayer points at the cost of 1-3 Hitpoints.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Statue (Darkmeyer)
Statue
Released4 June 2020 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestSins of the Father
LocationDarkmeyer
ExamineA strange vampyric statue.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID39234

The Statue is an altar located in the upper tier of Darkmeyer in a building just south of the bank. When prayed at, this altar will restore all Prayer points at the cost of 1-3 Hitpoints.

The statue along with candles surrounding it.
